raw_text: MALLAWARATCHIE – S. MALINI – It is with great sadness we announce the demise of S. Malini Mallawaratchie (nee Ratnatunga),​ Food Technologist,​ formerly at Marketing Department and ITI (CISIR),​ former Visiting Lecturer at the University of Colombo,​ former Food Technologist of the Food Advisory Committee of the Ministry of Health,​ beloved wife of Eng. Daya Mallawaratchie (former GM (RDA)),​ loving mother of Asha,​ beloved sister of Sujiva,​ Channa,​ Ajita and Kavan. A simple funeral was held on 29.08.2023 and the cremation took place at the General Cemetery Borella.055846

RATNAYAKE – R.M.A. – It is with great sadness we announce the demise of R.M.A. Ratnayake. Beloved husband of Mrs B.M. Ratnayake,​ loving father of Samantha Ratnayake (KLM,​ Netherlands) and Asanka Ratnayake (Hayley’s Adventis),​ father-in-law of Chithrangani Ratnayake and grandfather of Janisha Ratnayake. Remains lie at “The Respect Home” By Jayaratne’s from 9.00 a.m. on 4th September to 4.00 p.m. on 5th September 2023. Cortege leaves for cremation at (New Section) on 5th September 2023 at 4.30 p.m.055887
